ModMetaData.name: [tW] Finger and Toes for EPOE
ModMetaData.author: theWul
ModMetaData.description:
EPOE-extension to allow finger and toe replacements. Ensure that EPOE is loaded prior to this mod.
Changelog: 2018-11-23: 1.0 compatible Version stats and resources should balanced with EPOE
Credits to Ykara for the fantastic EPOE mod. 0.18 Version: https://github.com/theWul/-tw-Mods/tree/master/%5Btw%5D%20Finger%20and%20Toes%20for%20EPOE
